---
title: "Gamma-Results-Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rgamma-2-2.RData")
Gamma22 <- gamma22
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Gamma22Call <- stream_in(file("rgamma-2-2-Call-Revised-0806.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
Gamma22Result <- stream_in(file("rgamma_2_2_0806_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Gamma.2.2.OpenAI <- left_join(Gamma22Call,Gamma22Result)
Full.Gamma.2.2.0806 <- left_join(Gamma22$params, Gamma.2.2.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Gamma.2.2.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Gamma.2.2.0806$Outcome <- map_chr(Gamma22$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Gamma22Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Gamma.2.2.0806$Outcome)
```

```{r}
save(Full.Gamma.2.2.0806, file="Full.Gamma.2.2.0806.RData")
```
